sqls.sql: SELECT t.Odr_No_Main, t.pay_Cost, t.tot_Cost, s.cal_pay_Cost, s.cal_tot_Cost, s.related_Man, f.odr_Type, f.employ_Code, f.jia_Name, f.odr_Prt_Name FROM ( SELECT SUM (tot_Cost) AS tot_Cost, SUM (pay_Cost) AS pay_Cost, Odr_No_Main FROM tb_fin_order_gen WHERE is_Salary = 1 GROUP BY Odr_No_Main ) t INNER JOIN tb_salary_main s ON t.Odr_No_Main = s.Odr_No_Main INNER JOIN tb_fin_order_gen f on t.Odr_No_Main=f.odr_No WHERE t.tot_Cost > s.cal_tot_Cost OR t.pay_Cost < s.cal_pay_Cost

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.odr_No_Main, d.employ_Code, d.salary_Kind, t.cal_base_Salary, t.cal_Value, d.salary_Ratio, t.oper_date, SUM (ISNULL(g.salary_Grant, 0)) AS salary_Grant FROM tb_salary_main t LEFT JOIN tb_salary_main_item d ON d.odr_No_Main = t.odr_No_Main LEFT JOIN tb_salary_grant_item g ON d.odr_No_Main = g.odr_No_Main AND d.employ_Code = g.employ_Code GROUP BY t.odr_No_Main, d.employ_Code, d.salary_Kind, t.cal_base_Salary, t.cal_Value, t.oper_date, d.salary_Ratio ) s WHERE s.cal_base_Salary * s.cal_Value * s.salary_Ratio / 100 > s.salary_Grant

SELECT c.carriage_Id AS item_id, c.odr_No, c.carriage_Cost AS tot_cost, '运输' AS cost_type, c.carrier_Phone AS phone, c.oper_Date, 1 as item_type FROM tb_carriage_bill c WHERE c.carriage_State = 1 AND c.is_return_visit = 0 UNION SELECT i.item_Id, p.odr_No, i.item_Price * i.item_Qty, i.item_Name, i.item_Link, p.oper_Date, 2 as item_type FROM tb_project_Cost p INNER JOIN tb_project_Cost_Item i ON p.linkBill_Id = i.linkBill_Id WHERE p.cost_State = 1 AND i.is_return_visit = 0
